filmography.title: Citizen Kane
filmography.role_description: The principled best friend and drama critic who witnesses the rise and moral fall of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane.
filmography.plot: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

filmography.title: Lydia
filmography.role_description: A doctor who has loved the titular character for decades, serving as her confidant as she reminisces about her past loves.
filmography.plot: An elderly woman reunites with four former suitors and recalls the romances that shaped her life.

filmography.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
filmography.role_description: An automobile inventor and former suitor of the Amberson matriarch whose return signals the changing times that will doom the family.
filmography.plot: The spoiled heir to a decaying family fortune tries to keep his mother from marrying the man she has always loved.

filmography.title: Journey Into Fear
filmography.role_description: An American ballistics engineer in Turkey who becomes the target of Nazi assassins and must flee the country.
filmography.plot: An American engineer in Turkey is pursued by Nazi agents who want to kill him before he can return home with vital information.

filmography.title: Shadow of a Doubt
filmography.role_description: A charming but psychopathic serial killer known as the 'Merry Widow Murderer' who hides out with his unsuspecting family.
filmography.plot: A young woman discovers her visiting 'Uncle Charlie' may not be the man he seems, but a murderer on the run.

filmography.title: Hers to Hold
filmography.role_description: A dashing pilot who romances a wealthy debutante working in an aircraft factory to support the war effort.
filmography.plot: A debutante takes a job in a defense plant to be near the pilot she loves.

filmography.title: Gaslight
filmography.role_description: A Scotland Yard detective who becomes suspicious of a man's behavior toward his fragile wife and works to uncover the truth.
filmography.plot: Ten years after her aunt was murdered in their London home, a woman returns from Italy in the 1880s to resume residence with her new husband.

filmography.title: Since You Went Away
filmography.role_description: A charming naval officer and family friend who visits the Hilton household, bringing warmth and support during the war.
filmography.plot: A mother and her two daughters navigate life, love, and sacrifice while the father is away fighting in World War II.

filmography.title: I'll Be Seeing You
filmography.role_description: A shell-shocked soldier on furlough who falls in love with a woman on leave from prison, both hiding their secrets.
filmography.plot: A soldier suffering from combat fatigue meets a woman on Christmas furlough from prison, and they help each other heal.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Original Song ('I'll Be Seeing You')

filmography.title: Love Letters
filmography.role_description: A soldier who writes beautiful love letters for a friend, then falls in love with the recipient himself after the friend's death.
filmography.plot: A soldier writes love letters for a friend, but when he meets the recipient years later, she has amnesia and is accused of murder.

filmography.title: Duel in the Sun
filmography.role_description: The principled, educated son of a cattle baron who clashes with his wild brother over a beautiful woman.
filmography.plot: A beautiful woman causes a rift between two brothers on a Texas ranch, leading to a violent and tragic conclusion.

filmography.title: The Farmer's Daughter
filmography.role_description: A wealthy congressman who hires a Swedish-American farm girl as a maid and supports her run for office.
filmography.plot: A headstrong farm girl leaves home to become a nurse but ends up working as a maid for a political family and running for office.

filmography.title: Portrait of Jennie
filmography.role_description: A struggling artist who finds inspiration in a mysterious young girl who seems to age years every time they meet.
filmography.plot: A struggling artist meets a strange girl in Central Park who seems to be from another time and grows up with each encounter.
filmography.awards: Venice Film Festival: Win – Volpi Cup (Best Actor)

filmography.title: Under Capricorn
filmography.role_description: A former convict and wealthy landowner in Australia whose marriage is haunted by a dark secret from the past.
filmography.plot: A young man visits Australia and uncovers the dark secrets of a wealthy landowner and his disturbed wife.

filmography.title: The Third Man
filmography.role_description: A naive American pulp Western writer who travels to post-war Vienna to find his friend, only to uncover a dark conspiracy.
filmography.plot: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Win – Grand Prize of the Festival

filmography.title: Beyond the Forest
filmography.role_description: A kind, small-town doctor whose life is ruined by his adulterous and ambitious wife.
filmography.plot: A bored, murderous housewife tries to leave her small-town doctor husband for a wealthy industrialist.

filmography.title: September Affair
filmography.role_description: An industrialist who, after surviving a plane crash, decides to fake his death to live in Italy with his lover.
filmography.plot: Two lovers meet in Italy and decide to start a new life together after they are mistakenly listed as dead in a plane crash.

filmography.title: The Man with a Cloak
filmography.role_description: A mysterious, hard-drinking poet (implied to be Edgar Allan Poe) who helps a young French woman secure her inheritance.
filmography.plot: A woman visits New York in 1848 to ask her grandfather for money, but finds him under the control of his housekeeper.

filmography.title: The Steel Trap
filmography.role_description: An assistant bank manager who steals a million dollars and frantically tries to flee the country with his wife.
filmography.plot: A bank executive steals a fortune and races against time to escape to Brazil before the theft is discovered.

filmography.title: Niagara
filmography.role_description: A jealous, mentally unstable husband who becomes the target of a murder plot by his wife and her lover.
filmography.plot: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

filmography.title: Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte
filmography.role_description: A sinister family doctor who conspires with a woman's cousin to drive her insane and steal her fortune.
filmography.plot: An aging, reclusive Southern belle plagued by a horrifying family secret descends into madness when her cousin arrives to save the family estate.

filmography.title: Petulia
filmography.role_description: The wealthy, controlling father-in-law of the title character, representing the established upper class.
filmography.plot: A recently married socialite and a divorced doctor begin a tentative romance in 1960s San Francisco.

filmography.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
filmography.role_description: The U.S. Secretary of War during the attack on Pearl Harbor, portrayed with gravitas in this historical epic.
filmography.plot: A dramatic retelling of the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor and the series of American blunders that allowed it to happen.

filmography.title: The Abominable Dr. Phibes
filmography.role_description: A surgeon who becomes the target of a disfigured madman seeking revenge for his wife's death on the operating table.
filmography.plot: A doctor, scientist, organist, and biblical scholar seeks revenge on the nine doctors he considers responsible for his wife's death.

filmography.title: Soylent Green
filmography.role_description: A wealthy board member of the Soylent Corporation whose murder sets off the investigation revealing the horrifying truth.
filmography.plot: In a dystopian future, a police detective investigates the murder of a wealthy businessman and uncovers a state secret.
filmography.awards: Saturn Award: Win – Best Science Fiction Film

filmography.title: Airport '77
filmography.role_description: A wealthy passenger and old flame of Olivia de Havilland's character on a luxury 747 that crashes into the ocean.
filmography.plot: A private 747 carrying VIPs and art treasures is hijacked and crashes into the ocean, trapping the survivors underwater.

filmography.title: Heaven's Gate
filmography.role_description: A university orator who delivers a commencement speech in the film's opening; Cotten's final theatrical film role.
filmography.plot: A marshal tries to protect immigrant farmers from wealthy cattle barons in 1890s Wyoming.
